description: This file serves as the entry point for a React web application. It imports necessary dependencies, including React, ReactDOM, global CSS, and the main App component. It initializes the React application by rendering the App component inside a root element defined in the HTML.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the specified DOM node.
